templates.title: Snapby - Inlets
templates.description: Tunnel your private services to a remote network
templates.note: For Portainer with docker host mode

env.name: INLETS_DOMAIN
env.label: Domain
env.description: Base domain for the hostname of this instance. Like: lt.superchat.com.br

env.name: INLETS_HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname
env.description: Hostname for this instance. Note: Is not the full domain name, only the host part, like: dev001

templates.title: Snapby - Rocketchat
templates.description: The communications platform that puts data protection first.
templates.note: For Portainer with docker host mode

env.name: DEPLOY_DOMAIN
env.label: Domain
env.description: Base domain for the hostname of this instance. Like: tenant_slug.superchat.com.br

env.name: DEPLOY_ID
env.label: Hostname
env.description: Hostname for this instance. Note: Is not the full domain name, only the host part, like: rc
